name: The Glasses Multiple Choice Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 5 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Jerry has spit on someone from his apartment window.
questions.explanation:
False.

	When Elaine is looking out the window, both of them admit that they've never spit on somebody, but they've thought about it.  Kramer enters the apartment after this and tells Jerry that his friend finally got Jerry's new air conditioner in stock.

questions.text: What is the name of the new air conditioner?
questions.explanation:
Commando 8.

	Kramer tells Jerry and Elaine that this new air conditioner has 12,000 BTUs.  When Elaine remembers that Jerry never liked air conditioning, Kramer tells her that Jerry's new girlfriend, Amy, likes it.  After this, George enters the apartment wearing his swimming goggles.

questions.text: Where did George's glasses get lost?
questions.explanation:
At the pool.

	George has to wear his prescription swimming goggles since some guy stole his glasses while he was in the pool.  When Elaine asks why he doesn't have a spare pair, he explains that he broke them playing basketball.  Jerry tells Elaine that they were actually broken when he was running from a bee.

questions.text: What is the name of the place where George buys new glasses?
questions.explanation:
J & T Optical.

	When Kramer suggests that George go to a local store to buy glasses, he tells George to mention the name 'Kramer' and he'll get a discount.  George, Jerry, and Elaine head down to the store and try on glasses.  Although Jerry is bored out of his mind, Elaine tries to help George find a good pair.  When George says Kramer's name, nothing happens.

questions.text: Who is bitten in the leg by a dog?
questions.explanation:
Elaine.

	While looking at glasses, a man and his dog go into the store, and when Elaine tries to pet it, it bites her in the leg.  George runs outside to try and stop the man, but he thinks he sees something shocking.  Meanwhile, Elaine wants to go to the hospital, but Jerry wants to find out what George thinks that he saw.

questions.text: What is the name of the cousin that George thinks kissed Amy?
questions.explanation:
Jeffrey.

	When Jerry continues to ask what's so important, George finally tells Jerry that he thinks that he saw Jerry's girlfriend, Amy, kiss his cousin, Jeffrey.  Jeffrey has been mentioned in a few episodes in past seasons by Uncle Leo.  Leo tells Jerry that Jeffrey has been very successful with his recent job in the parks department.

questions.text: What does George find on the floor in Jerry's apartment?
questions.explanation:
A dime.

	When Jerry confronts Amy about the issue, she denies it and tells him that her dates with him were too good to be true.  The next day, Jerry argues with George over the reliability of George's squinting, and George manages to spot a dime across the room without his glasses on.

questions.text: What is the name of the little white dog near Jerry's building?
questions.explanation:
Snowball.

	When Elaine comes to the apartment, Jerry tells her that she was supposed to arrive a while earlier.  She tells Jerry that she was spooked by the little dog outside of his building and couldn't get in.  When she says that she didn't get a rabies shot, Jerry tells her to find out if the owner of the optical store knows the name of the dog.

questions.text: What does George eat in Jerry's apartment?
questions.explanation:
onion.

	When the group is discussing George's eyesight, George accidentally bite into an onion that he thought was a fruit.  Jerry doesn't know what to believe anymore since George is extremely far-sighted.  Meanwhile, Kramer manages to get George the discount he needs for his glasses.

questions.text: What musician does Jerry get tickets to see?
questions.explanation:
Paul Simon.

	In order to see if Jeffrey and Amy know each other, he takes her to Jeffrey's apartment when he picks up the tickets.  When he arrives, Uncle Leo tells him that Jeffrey is out, and when Jerry assumes that he's figured everything out, he realizes that Amy doesn't know Jeffrey.  Elaine gets her shot, and the air conditioner falls on the dog that bit her.  George exchanges his glasses, and doesn't find his old pair on top of his locker at the gym.
